events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but I want to request a refund as it does not fit me properly.
The reported issue pertains to a refund request for the recent jacket purchase made by the customer.
Assigning the case to customer service agent Mark for further assistance regarding refund.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m Mark and I’ll assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or if you need instructions on how to return it?
The order number is 4598302, and I haven’t returned the jacket yet. Please send me the return instructions.
Thank you for the details. We will email you the return shipping label along with instructions to send the jacket back for a full refund.
I received the return label and instructions via email. Thanks for the quick response and clear guidance.
We have successfully provided all information necessary to process your refund. Please proceed with the return shipment at your convenience.
Checking in to see if you were able to return the jacket and if there is any other assistance we can provide regarding your refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket back yesterday and am waiting for the refund to be processed. Thanks for following up.
Your return has been received and your refund has been issued. Please check your account and let us know if you need further assistance.
Closing this case as your refund was processed successfully. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
